title: Amazon Makes Alexa Chattier and More Capable Using Generative AI
description: The new smarts and conversational tone are meant to improve interactions with the bot and its home-entertainment and smart-home controls.

title: Amazon Tries Giving Hardware an AI Shine
description: Generative AI is coming to Alexa devices, but AWS will prove to be the real battleground.

title: FTC Updates Amazon Suit Over Prime Enrollment, Naming Executives
description: The Federal Trade Commission disclosed new details in its lawsuit against Amazon.com involving an alleged scheme to unwittingly enroll customers in the company’s Prime program.

title: Review: Why the Apple Watch Isn't as Useful as It Could Be
description: There is a new double-tap feature and a brighter screen, but the latest model has the same battery life the watches have had since 2015: 18 hours.

title: The Billionaire Keeping TikTok on Phones in the U.S.
description: Financier Jeff Yass made a big bet on the app, and he’s a top donor to lawmakers who support it.
